Title: Our country is a united and unified multi-cultural nation
Designer: Ma Hongdao (马宏道)Ni Fanghua (倪芳华)Ding Yuguan (丁狱冠)
Publisher: Shanghai jiaoyu chubanshe (上海教育出版社)
Notes: Representatives of the various 'National Minorities' of China, with the Han worker in the centre. In the background, a symbolic representation of Tian'anmen (the Gate of Heavenly Peace) in Beijing.
